actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to add certain lands in the Los Padres National Forest, Calif., to the Ventana Wilderness.

summary.text: Adds specified lands in the State of California to the Ventana Wilderness, Los Padres National Forest, in such State.

titles.title: A bill to add certain lands in the Los Padres National Forest, Calif., to the Ventana Wilderness.
